text: The Election Commission of India has not announced any changes to the schedule for the 2024 General Elections. Voting will proceed as per the notification dated March 16, 2024.
Electronic Voting Machines (EVMs) are standalone devices not connected to the internet, making them immune to remote hacking.
The Government of India has not declared any financial emergency. The economy is stable and growing.
Article 324 of the Constitution vests the superintendence, direction and control of elections in an Election Commission.
There is no provision for 'challenging vote' via SMS. 49-O was related to 'not conducting a vote' but is now replaced by NOTA.
